mapper.select: SELECT io_id, io_num, m.ma_num, m.ma_name, c.clt_num, c.clt_name, i.io_cnt, i.io_unit, m.ma_price, i.io_date, i.io_state, i.rec_date, i.emp_id FROM in_order i JOIN material m ON i.ma_id = m.ma_id JOIN client c ON i.clt_id = c.clt_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO in_order (io_num, ma_id, clt_id, io_cnt, io_unit, io_date, io_state, rec_date, emp_id) SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING(io_num, 1, 2), LPAD(max(io_id) + 1, 6, '0')), #{ma_id}, #{clt_id}, #{io_cnt}, #{io_unit}, now(), #{io_state}, #{rec_date}, #{emp_id} FROM in_order WHERE io_num LIKE CONCAT('%', 'IO', '%');
